languages.text: "Уж постарайся добраться до мостика — хочу лично пожать горло столь проблемной персоне".
"Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome individual."
languages.original_text: "Уж постарайся добраться до мостика — хочу лично пожать горло столь проблемной персоне".

traits.locale_text: "Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome figure."
"Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome figure."
"Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome individual."
"Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome individual."
"Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome individual."
"Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome individual."

languages.text: «Intenta llegar al puente, por favor. Me encantaría agarrar de la garganta a una persona tan irritante como tú».
languages.original_text: "Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome individual."

traits.locale_text: «Intenta llegar al puente, por favor. Me encantaría agarrar de la garganta a una persona tan irritante como tú».

languages.text: “想来舰桥的话，尽管来吧。你在我的船上惹了这么多麻烦，我要亲手扭断你的脖子。”
languages.original_text: "Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome individual."

traits.locale_text: “想来舰桥的话，尽管来吧。你在我的船上惹了这么多麻烦，我要亲手扭断你的脖子。”

languages.text: « Tâchez de ne pas vous faire tuer avant d'atteindre la passerelle, j'adorerais écraser sous ma botte une punaise de votre acabit. »
languages.original_text: "Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome individual."

traits.locale_text: « Tâchez de ne pas vous faire tuer avant d'atteindre la passerelle, j'adorerais écraser sous ma botte une punaise de votre acabit. »

languages.text: 「ぜひブリッジまでたどり着いてくれ―そんな面倒なやつの喉をブルブルさせたくなるからな」
languages.original_text: "Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome individual."

traits.locale_text: 「ぜひブリッジまでたどり着いてくれ―そんな面倒なやつの喉をブルブルさせたくなるからな」

languages.text: "Köprüye buyurun. Senin gibi tek vasfı sorun çıkarmak olan birini boğazlamayı iple çekiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome individual."

traits.locale_text: "Köprüye buyurun. Senin gibi tek vasfı sorun çıkarmak olan birini boğazlamayı iple çekiyorum."

languages.text: "Ihr könnt gerne versuchen, die Brücke zu erreichen ... dann kann ich Euch persönlich den Hals umdrehen."
languages.original_text: "Do try to make it to the bridge — I would like to shake the throat of such a troublesome individual."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt gerne versuchen, die Brücke zu erreichen ... dann kann ich Euch persönlich den Hals umdrehen."
